coref_content: Delta State Governor Ifeanyi Okowa have call on oil company operate in Delta State to create employment for the people in oil company's host community to foster sustainable cooperation and conducive environment. speak on Monday in Asaba when the management of AGIP Oil Company Limited, lead by AGIP Oil Company Limited's General Manager, Palio Carnivale, pay Delta State Governor Ifeanyi Okowa a visit, Delta State Governor Ifeanyi Okowa say that AGIP Oil Company Limited ....

Every society needs viable opposition - Governor Okowa -.
